REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0789 reute d f BC-MONOCLONAL-ANTIBODIES 03-06 0047

TEXT.TITLE: MONOCLONAL ANTIBODIES <MABS> BUYS COMPANY
TEXT.BODY: Monoclonal Antibodies Inc said it signed an agreement in principle to buy <Genesis Labs Inc> for about 10 mln dlrs of common stock. The agreement is subject to shareholders approval and other conditions. Reuter
